description: Written and directed by Lokkesh Ajls, Eleven is a Tamil Crime Thriller that follows a police officer, portrayed by Naveen Chandra, who is assigned to solve a serial murder case, however, the investigation gets complex when he faces challenges in his path to solve them. Streaming starts from June 13th, 2025, only on AhaTamil
title: Eleven OTT Release Date Announced: Know Where to Watch This Tamil Crime Thriller

description: NASA has unveiled a spectacular near-infrared image of the Sombrero Galaxy taken by the James Webb Space Telescope. This fresh perspective showcases the glowing stellar bulge and dust distribution, deepening our understanding of how galaxies evolve over time.
title: James Webb Space Telescope Captures Stunning Near-Infrared View of Sombrero Galaxy

description: NASA has revised the 2032 impact odds of asteroid 2024 YR4 hitting the Moon to 4.3%, up from 3.8%, based on new data from the James Webb Space Telescope. Though once feared for its high Earth impact risk, scientists now say it poses no threat and offers critical insights for future planetary defense strategies.
title: NASA Slightly Raises Odds of Asteroid Hitting the Moon in 2032 After Updated JWST Data

description: NASA's Perseverance rover reached new ground on June 7, 2025, exploring ancient Martian terrain at Fallbreen and moving into the Forlandet quadrangle near Jezero Crater. This region may contain Mars' oldest rocks, offering key insights into the planet’s early geology. The mission also honors Earth's own exploration history by naming Martian sites after Arctic landmarks.
title: Perseverance Rover Studies Ancient Martian Rocks at Fallbreen and Forlandet Quadrangle

description: Directed and starring Donnie Yen, The Prosecutor is a Chinese Action-Thriller movie that follows a prosecutor, who is set to prove a man’s innocence who has been found guilty, after being falsely accused of drug-trafficking. He has put everything on stake to prove his innocence. Will he succeed? Streaming starts from June 13th, 2025, only on Lionsgate Play.
title: The Prosecutor OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Nothing announced its 'Now or Nothing' sale in India, which will be held from June 11 to June 15. The Nothing Phone 3a Pro will be available at a discounted price of Rs. 26,999 during the sale. Buyers will be able to get the CMF Phone 2 Pro for as low as Rs. 17,999. The company is offering discounts on TWS headsets and other wearables as well.
title: Nothing Announces 'Now or Nothing’ Sale in India for Nothing and CMF-Branded Products

description: Activision signed a 10-year licensing deal with Nintendo in 2023, committing to bring Call of Duty to the company's platforms. Now, after confirming Black Ops 7, the publisher has said it is working with Nintendo to bring Call of Duty to Switch.
title: Activision Says It's Working With Nintendo to Bring Call of Duty to Switch After Black Ops 7 Reveal

description: The Asus TUF Gaming F16 is powered by an Intel Core i7 CPU, while the TUF Gaming A16 has an AMD Ryzen 9 8940HX chip. The Asus ROG Strix G16 comes with AMD Ryzen 9 8940HX and Intel Core Ultra 9 275HX CPU variants. The Asus ROG Zephyrus G14 is backed by an AMD Ryzen 9 270 CPU. The TUF Gaming F16, TUF Gaming A16, and ROG Strix G16 variants support up to an Nvidia GeForce RTX 5070 GPU, while the ROG Zephyrus G14 comes with an RTX 5060 GPU.
title: Asus TUF Gaming F16, TUF Gaming A16, ROG Strix G16 and ROG Zephyrus G14 2025 Variants Launched in India
Budget Tablets Take Over: Top Picks Under ₹15,000 Now on Flipkart

description: The UK government appointed Andrew Small as the first crypto specialist in the Insolvency Service, which is responsible for the recovery and tracing assets linked to bankrupt individuals or liquidated companies. In the past five years, the number of insolvency cases involving crypto as a recoverable asset have clocked a massive increase of 420 percent, as per the UK government
title: UK Bolsters Web3 Investigations, Appoints First Crypto Intelligence Specialist to Insolvency Service

description: Liquid Glass design language was introduced by Apple at the WWDC 2025 on Monday. The new design language brings a glass-like material that can both reflect and refract content in the background. The company says this new element was built using new graphics technologies powered by Apple silicon and hardware.
title: What is Liquid Glass Interface, Apple’s New Universal Design Language for iPhone, iPad, Mac, and Other Devices

description: Android 16 update will begin rolling out to select devices starting Wednesday, June 11. Google is introducing the stable version of its next generation of operating system earlier than the previous years. This year, the Mountain View-based tech giant is introducing the Material 3 Expressive design, a new battery health monitoring system, improvements to Quick Settings and Live Activities, and more.
title: Android 16 Update Release Date, Eligible Devices and What to Expect

description: Indian Air Force pilot Shubhanshu Shukla will become the first Indian astronaut to reach the ISS via a private mission when Axiom-4 launches on June 10. With 15 years of flying experience, Shukla has earned admiration from international crewmates for his skill and insight, hoping his journey inspires India’s next generation of space explorers.
title: IAF Pilot Shubhanshu Shukla to Become First Indian on ISS via Private Space Mission

description: Microsoft on Monday released the Windows 11 Insider Preview Build to the Dev Channel which lets users try out the new Start Menu for the first time. It introduces a scrollable interface in the Start Menu, new viewing options, and adaptability to different screen sizes. Further, users can also benefit from integration of the Phone Link app which enables them to take a peek at their messages, calls, and other information.
title: Latest Windows 11 Insider Preview Lets You Try a New Start Menu With Scrollable Interface, More Features

description: Vi announced the rollout of its 5G services in Bengaluru. Vi users with 5G-supported smartphones can access the high-speed 5G network starting June 11. The carrier had rolled out 5G services in Mumbai, Delhi-NCR, Patna, and Chandigarh last month. As a launch offer, Vi is providing unlimited 5G data on prepaid plans starting at Rs. 299.
title: Vodafone Idea (Vi) Announces Rollout of 5G Services in Bengaluru

description: ChatGPT is currently down for thousands of users in India, the US, and other regions. According to an outage monitoring website, the outage began at 12:10pm IST with a few hundred reports coming in. Since then, it has escalated into a wide-scale outage with thousands of users reportedly facing problems while generating responses on the OpenAI AI chatbot.
title: ChatGPT Down: Thousands of Users Report Problems While Generating Responses, Video Generation on Sora

description: Hollow Knight: Silksong is coming this year before the holiday season, developer Team Cherry has confirmed. The studio has said the game is not tied to the launch of ROG Xbox Ally handhelds, which will release in Holiday 2025.
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Will Release Before Holiday 2025, Not Tied to Xbox Ally Launch, Developer Says

description: Nothing Phone 3 is confirmed to launch globally on July 1. Ahead of the launch, a leaked render has surfaced that suggests that the handset will have a transparent back panel and a triple rear camera unit with a periscope telephoto lens. The leaked image suggests that Nothing will likely exclude the Glyph Interface from the Phone 3, as previously teased.
title: Nothing Phone 3 Leaked Render Suggests Transparent Back Panel, Triple Rear Cameras, No Glyph Interface

description: Realme is offering Rs. 3,000 bank discounts and up to Rs. 6,000 exchange discount for customers who are looking to purchase the Realme GT 7 and Realme GT 7T in India. This limited-period deal is currently available on Amazon and realme India website and will end on June 14.
title: Realme GT 7, Realme GT 7T Get Up to Rs. 6,000 Discount for a Limited Time in India

description: Walt Disney must pay $438.7 million (roughly Rs. 3,755 crore) more to Comcast to complete its purchase of the Hulu streaming service. Disney agreed in 2019 that it would acquire Comcast’s one-third stake in the business at price that valued the whole enterprise at a minimum of $27.5 billion (roughly Rs. 23,54,206 crore) starting in 2024.
title: Disney to Pay Comcast $439 Million More for Its Hulu Stake

description: iPadOS 26 introduces a new windowing system that lets users resize, reposition, and open multiple app windows with ease. Resized windows retain their size and position when reopened. The new Expose feature allows users an overview of all open windows, and a new menu bar provides simplified access to app commands. The trackpad pointer is also updated for improved precision and now resembles a traditional arrow.
title: iPadOS 26 Brings Improved Multitasking With New Windowing System, Menu Bar, and More

description: Konami is hosting a dedicated livestream on Meta Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater and Silent Hill f this week. The event will be livestreamed on the company's YouTube and Twitch channels. Both games recieved new trailers at Sony's State of Play broadcast last week.
title: Konami to Host Livestream Focussed on Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater and Silent Hill f This Week

description: Motorola Edge 60 has been launched in india. It comes with a MediaTek Dimensity 7400 SoC coupled with 12GB of RAM. The handset features a 1.5K pOLED quad-curved display and a 5,500mAh battery with 68W fast charging support. For optics, it has a 50-megapixel triple rear camera unit and a 50-megapixel selfie shooter. The Edge 60 will offer three years of OS upgrades and four years of security updates.
title: Motorola Edge 60 With MediaTek Dimensity 7400 SoC, Triple Rear Cameras Launched in India: Price, Features

description: A picture of a Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra with a shattered front glass recently surfaced on social media. This is said to have been a result of shrapnel striking the phone which, while severely damaged the phone, prevented it from dealing a fatal blow to the soldier. Later, Samsung allegedly reached out to the person and offered a repair free of charge.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra Allegedly Saves Life by Stopping Shrapnel; Samsung Offers Free Repair

description: Samsung, in a new blog post, said that its latest Galaxy Z series devices are designed to surpass the competition in the foldable category. Expected to be the Galaxy Z Fold 7, the company claimed the foldable to have a thin and lightweight build. The teaser video shows a smartphone with a book-style foldable form.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Teased; Claimed to Be Slimmest, Lightest, and Most Advanced Foldable Yet

description: SpaceX launched SiriusXM's SXM-10 satellite early Saturday, June 7, aboard a Falcon 9 rocket from Cape Canaveral. The mission marked the eighth flight for the reused first-stage booster, which landed on the drone ship “A Shortfall of Gravitas.” SXM-10, a 6,400-kg satellite built by Maxar, will enter geostationary orbit to enhance SiriusXM’s broadcasting services across North America.
title: SpaceX Launches SiriusXM’s SXM-10 Satellite, Nails Booster Landing

description: Vivo Y400 Pro's alleged marketing images have leaked online, hinting at the phone's design and key specifications. It is tipped to feature a 6.77-inch 3D curved AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate and is said to run on a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 chipset. The Vivo Y400 Pro could offer a dual rear camera unit led by a 50-megapixel Sony IMX882 sensor.
title: Vivo Y400 Pro Design, Key Specifications Leaked; Tipped to Get Dimensity 7300 SoC, 5,500mAh Battery

description: Apple unveiled visionOS 26 during the keynote session of its Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) 2025. The next major update to the operating system for the Vision Pro is available as a developer beta and will be released globally later this year. The operating system adds new spatial effects to Widgets and Safari browser, and improves Personas and shared spatial spaces.
title: WWDC 2025: visionOS 26 Announced With Improvements to Personas and New Spatial Features

description: Apple previewed Xcode 26, its app development suite for its various platforms, at the Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) 2025. The new version brings a couple of AI features for developers. First is the ability to use ChatGPT or other AI models for coding-related tasks. App Intent is also getting support for visual intelligence.
title: WWDC 2025: Xcode 26 Adds ChatGPT Integration, Support for Other AI Models

description: Tata Motors plans to invest up to Rs. 35,000 crore ($4.1 billion) over the next five years. The company plans to nearly double its portfolio from eight models to 15, launch more EVs and compressed natural gas cars as well as enhance the vehicles' technology features.
title: Tata Motors to Invest up to $4 Billion Over Five Years for EVs, New Cars

description: Apple unveiled the latest tvOS 26 update for the Apple TV at WWDC 2025 on Monday. It brings several quality-of-life improvements for the Apple TV. The new Liquid Glass design has made made standard across tvOS 26 and other new software for a more cohesive appearance. Users can now select from different profiles when Apple TV wakes up and experience a more personalised FaceTime with Contact Posters.
title: WWDC 2025: Apple Announces tvOS 26 With Liquid Glass Design, Personalised FaceTime Experience, and More

description: Apple introduced the iPadOS 26 and iOS 26 updates at WWDC 2025 on Monday. It also confirmed the list of iPad and iPhone models, which will be compatible with the latest software. Meanwhile, as with all software updates, the company is dropping support for two iPhone and one iPad model, namely, the iPhone XR and XS and the 7th generation iPad (2019).
title: iOS 26 and iPadOS 26 Drop Support for Three Older Devices: Check If Yours Made the Cut

description: Apple's latest macOS Tahoe 26 update is confirmed to be the final macOS version to support Intel-powered Macs. The Intel-based Macs will get security updates for a few more years, but will no longer get any major software updates post macOS 26. Mac computers with Apple's chips will get macOS 27 and beyond starting next year.
title: WWDC 2025: macOS Tahoe 26 to Be the Last Major Software Update for Intel-Powered Macs

description: Apple announced a full suite of upgrades, with Liquid Glass being the biggest. The new software platforms, iOS 26, iPadOS 26, and more, will feature a glass theme across the system. This is the first major overhaul of the software design since iOS 7, introduced in 2013. The new iOS 26 will be available for the latest iPhone 17, launching in September and as a software update to older iPhone devices.
title: WWDC 2025: Prepare for iOS 26, iPadOS 26, and the Dazzling Era of Liquid Glass

description: Apple's iOS 26 Developer Beta 1 update is now available to registered developers after the tech giant's Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) 2025 keynote took place on Monday. The beta update comes with many of the new features previewed at the annual developer conference, including the new Liquid Glass design language which displays translucent elements throughout the UI. Here’s how to install the iOS 26 Developer Beta 1 update.
title: Apple Releases iOS 26 Developer Beta 1 Update After WWDC 2025: How to Install, Compatible Models

description: Apple unveiled watchOS 26 at WWDC today with a refreshed Liquid Glass design. The update brings upgrades to Smart Stack, Control Centre, and the Photos watch face. It offers an AI-powered Workout Buddy that provides real-time personalised insights based on fitness history. The Workout app gets a new layout, Smart Stack predictions are improved, and users can now dismiss notifications with a simple wrist flick.
title: WWDC 2025: watchOS 26 Offers AI Workout Buddy, Wrist Flick Gesture, Liquid Glass Design, and More

description: Apple on Monday unveiled iPadOS 26 during the keynote address of its Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) 2025. It is dubbed as the “biggest iPadOS release ever” and introduces a visual overhaul which is in line with the new Liquid Glass design language. This year, Apple has focussed on increasing productivity on the iPad with iPadOS 26, with features like a new windowing system, audio input selection, window tiling, new menu bar, improvements to Files app, and a new Preview app.
title: WWDC 2025: Apple Unveils iPadOS 26 With New Windowing System, Liquid Glass UI, and More

description: Apple unveiled macOS Tahoe 26 during the keynote session of the Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) 2025. The company is rebranding the next major update of its operating system for its Mac devices, adding a new design language called Liquid Glass, as well as bringing new Continuity features and upgrades to Spotlight for users.
title: WWDC 2025: macOS Tahoe 26 Unveiled With New Design, Continuity Features and Big Update to Spotlight
